channel.title: Steam slow down computer?
channel.description:
Whenever i install steam on my pc or on my friends pc, thats when the pc starts getting slow and a little messed up.
Is it just me or does anyone else experience this?

item.title: Steam slow down computer?
item.dc:creator: coldroll
item.description:
Steam does eat alot of resources but even then your PC should still be fast assuming it’s 5 years old or newer.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam slow down computer?
item.dc:creator: KenCastle
item.description:
I haven’t had any problems recently with Steam and I’ve been running it on my old computer. Steam actually works better on my older PC than my newer & more powerful one. Odd, I know.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam slow down computer?
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Steam hasn’t given me a problem since it’s good ol’ green GUI days.

item.title: Steam slow down computer?
item.dc:creator: coldroll
item.description:
Yeah steam does eat alot of resources more in the past year due to the new GUI update.

item.title: Steam slow down computer?
item.dc:creator: TDF
item.description:
Steam is a bloated program, if you have a weak computer than it’ll probably suffer. Even more so when you’re playing a game.

To reiterate what everyone else has already said;

specs?

Read full topic

item.title: Steam slow down computer?
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
Problem is your computer, like so, Specs? is it cluttered with crap?

Read full topic

item.title: Steam slow down computer?
item.dc:creator: Kaweebo
item.description:
While it’s running I don’t have a problem unless I have multiple other programs running.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam slow down computer?
item.dc:creator: geekofalltrades
item.description:
Are you running a multi-core processor? I remember there was at one point an issue with Steam accidentally taking up an entire core, which could be messing up some of your threaded processes. You might want to look for it on the Steam support site.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam slow down computer?
item.dc:creator: robot_deodorant
item.description:
I don’t have any problems. But generally speaking as you install more and more things onto a pc’s HDD it can slow it down.

PC specs?

Read full topic

item.title: Steam slow down computer?
item.dc:creator: Luciel
item.description:
I don´t have any issues with it… but I do remember the first couple of times I started it after installing it, it was quite slow, maybe give it a few trys?
